name: Cycle Adventure
description:
Short 2D platformer, focused on the story, with elements of terror. First game made by me at Unity, don't create expectations when playing, the game is simple haha! The project is on my github, in case anyone wants to see: 
Cycle Adventure.EXE

Credits:

The game contains assets from "Pixel Adventure 1", made by Pixel Frog, check his work here (incredible asset)

Game music "Pim Poy"

Thank you!
